rukus.text: 16|61|Arau allahe yadi manuhaka sihamtara simalanghanara babe sasti dilehemtena tente bhuprsthata kono jira-jantuke'i raeha'i nidilehemtena; kintu te'om eta nirdista samaya laike sihamtaka arakasa diye. Eteke yetiya sihamtara samaya ahi parae tetiya sihamte eta muhurtta'o aga-picha karaiba noraarae.

16|62|Arau sihamte yi apachanda karae se'itorae'i allahara prati araopa karae. Sihamtara jibha'i micha birarana diye ye, mangala kerala sihamtara babe'i. Nisandehe sihamtara babe ache agni, arau niscaya sihamtake'i sarbaprathama tata niksepa karaa haâ€™ba.

16|63|Allahara sapata! Ami tomara purbe'o bahu jatira ocarata raachula praerana karaicho; kintu cayatane se'ibora jatira karyakalapa sihamtara drstita sobhaniya karai dichila, seye aji si sihamtara abhibharaka arau sihamtara babe'i ache yantranadayaka sasti.

16|64|Arau ami tomara prati kitaba aratirna karaicho yisakale e'i bisaye matabheda karae sihamtaka suspastabharae buja'i diyara babe arau i hidayata arau rahamata sbaraupa se'i sampradayara babe yisakale imana posana karae.
16|65|Arau allahe'i akasara paraa pani barsana karae arau tara dbaraa te'om mrta bhumika punarjiraita karae. Niscaya iyata nidarsana ache ene sampradayara babe yisakale (allahara) katha sune.
